com.tome25.utils.logging

Class LogTracer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tome25.utils.logging.LogTracer

  • public class LogTracer
extends Object
    A utility class to improve logging.
    Used to trace the system outputs, and to get custom Loggers logging to the system output.
    Author:
    ToMe25

      static String classNameToSimpleClassName(String className)
      Converts the class name with package to a simple class name without.
      static StackTraceElement getCallerStackTraceElement(String callerName)
      Gets the first StackTraceElement in the Thread calling this method from the given class.
      static Logger getError()
      Gets the system error Logger.
      static Logger getGlobal()
      Gets the global Logger and makes it log messages with log level info or below to System.out, and warning or above to System.err.
      static Logger getLogger(String name)
      Gets a Logger that logs messages with log level info or below to System.out, and warning or above to System.err, with the given custom name.
      static Logger getOutput()
      Gets the system output Logger.
      static void resetErr()
      Resets the system error output to its value from before this class changed it.
      static void resetOut()
      Resets the system output to its value from before this class changed it.
      static void setConfig(File config)
      Sets the config file for the system error and output PrintStream TracingFormatters.
      If this is null a config file with a default name will be created in a directory called "config" in the directory the file that is currently being executed is stored in.
      If that file is a directory a config file with a default name will be created in this directory.
      static void setErrorConfig(File errorConfig)
      Sets the config file for the system error PrintStream TracingFormatters.
      If this is null a config file with a default name will be created in a directory called "config" in the directory the file that is currently being executed is stored in.
      If that file is a directory a config file with a default name will be created in this directory.
      static void setOutputConfig(File outputConfig)
      Sets the config file for the system output PrintStream TracingFormatters.
      If this is null a config file with a default name will be created in a directory called "config" in the directory the file that is currently being executed is stored in.
      If that file is a directory a config file with a default name will be created in this directory.
      static void traceError(File log)
      Sets system error PrintStream(System.err) to a LoggingPrintStream printing to a Logger logging to the old PrintStream and a FileOutputStream writing to the given log file.
      static void traceError(File config, File log)
      Sets system error PrintStream(System.err) to a LoggingPrintStream printing to a Logger logging to the old PrintStream and a FileOutputStream writing to the given log file.
      Also sets the TracingFormatter config file.
      static void traceError(File config, OutputStream... additionalStreams)
      Sets system error PrintStream to a LoggingPrintStream printing to a Logger logging to the old PrintStream and the given OutputStreams.
      Also sets the TracingFormatter config file.

      Sets system error PrintStream to a LoggingPrintStream printing to a Logger logging to the old PrintStream and the given OutputStreams.
      static void traceOutput(File log)
      Sets system output PrintStream(System.out) to a LoggingPrintStream printing to a Logger logging to the old PrintStream and a FileOutputStream writing to the given log file.

      Sets system output and error PrintStream to a LoggingPrintStream printing to a Logger logging to the old PrintStream and a FileOutputStream to the log file.

      Sets system output and error PrintStream to a LoggingPrintStream printing to a Logger logging to the old PrintStream and a FileOutputStream to their respective log file.

    • Method Detail

      • traceOutputs

        public static void traceOutputs(String log)
        Sets system output and error PrintStream to a LoggingPrintStream printing to a Logger logging to the old PrintStream and a FileOutputStream to the log file.
        Parameters:
        log - the file to log the system error stream to.

      • traceOutputs

        public static void traceOutputs(String errorLog,
                                String outputLog)
        Sets system output and error PrintStream to a LoggingPrintStream printing to a Logger logging to the old PrintStream and a FileOutputStream to their respective log file.
        Parameters:
        errorLog - the file to log the system error stream to.
        outputLog - the file to log the system output stream to.

      • traceOutputs

        public static void traceOutputs(File log)
        Sets system output and error PrintStream to a LoggingPrintStream printing to a Logger logging to the old PrintStream and a FileOutputStream to the log file.
        Parameters:
        log - the file to log the system error stream to.

      • traceOutputs

        public static void traceOutputs(File errorLog,
                                File outputLog)
        Sets system output and error PrintStream to a LoggingPrintStream printing to a Logger logging to the old PrintStream and a FileOutputStream to their respective log file.
        Parameters:
        errorLog - the file to log the system error stream to.
        Set to null to disable changing System.err.
        outputLog - the file to log the system output stream to.
        Set to null to disable changing System.out.

      • traceOutputs

        public static void traceOutputs(File config,
                                File errorLog,
                                File outputLog)
        Sets system output and error PrintStream to a LoggingPrintStream printing to a Logger logging to the old PrintStream and a FileOutputStream to their respective log file.
        Also sets the TracingFormatter config file.
        Parameters:
        config - The config file to use for the TracingFormatter.
        If this is null a config file with a default name will be created in a directory called "config" in the directory the file that is currently being executed is stored in.
        If this is a directory a config file with a default name will be created in this directory.
        errorLog - the file to log the system error stream to.
        Set to null to disable changing System.err.
        outputLog - the file to log the system output stream to.
        Set to null to disable changing System.out.

      • traceOutputs

        public static void traceOutputs(OutputStream... additionalStreams)
        Sets system output and error PrintStream to a LoggingPrintStream printing to a Logger logging to the old PrintStream and the OutputStreams from additionalStreams.
        Parameters:
        additionalStreams - the OutputStreams to add to System.out

      • traceOutputs

        public static void traceOutputs(File config,
                                OutputStream... additionalStreams)
        Sets system output and error PrintStream to a LoggingPrintStream printing to a Logger logging to the old PrintStream and the OutputStreams from additionalStreams.
        Also sets the TracingFormatter config file.
        Parameters:
        config - The config file to use for the TracingFormatter.
        If this is null a config file with a default name will be created in a directory called "config" in the directory the file that is currently being executed is stored in.
        If this is a directory a config file with a default name will be created in this directory.
        additionalStreams - the OutputStreams to add to System.out and System.err.

      • traceError

        public static void traceError(File log)
                       throws FileNotFoundException
        Sets system error PrintStream(System.err) to a LoggingPrintStream printing to a Logger logging to the old PrintStream and a FileOutputStream writing to the given log file.
        Parameters:
        log - the log file to write the error output to.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - if the log file exists but is a directory rather than a regular file, does not exist but cannot be created, or cannot be opened for any other reason.

      • traceError

        public static void traceError(File config,
                              File log)
                       throws FileNotFoundException
        Sets system error PrintStream(System.err) to a LoggingPrintStream printing to a Logger logging to the old PrintStream and a FileOutputStream writing to the given log file.
        Also sets the TracingFormatter config file.
        Parameters:
        log - the log file to write the error output to.
        config - The config file to use for the TracingFormatter.
        If this is null a config file with a default name will be created in a directory called "config" in the directory the file that is currently being executed is stored in.
        If this is a directory a config file with a default name will be created in this directory.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - if the log file exists but is a directory rather than a regular file, does not exist but cannot be created, or cannot be opened for any other reason.

        Sets system error PrintStream to a LoggingPrintStream printing to a Logger logging to the old PrintStream and the given OutputStreams.
        Parameters:
        additionalStreams - the OutputStreams to add to System.err.

        public static void traceOutput(File log)
                        throws FileNotFoundException
        Sets system output PrintStream(System.out) to a LoggingPrintStream printing to a Logger logging to the old PrintStream and a FileOutputStream writing to the given log file.
        Parameters:
        log - the log file to write the standard output to.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - if the log file exists but is a directory rather than a regular file, does not exist but cannot be created, or cannot be opened for any other reason.

      • traceOutput

        public static void traceOutput(File config,
                               File log)
                        throws FileNotFoundException
        Sets system output PrintStream(System.out) to a LoggingPrintStream printing to a Logger logging to the old PrintStream and a FileOutputStream writing to the given log file.
        Also sets the TracingFormatter config file.
        Parameters:
        log - the log file to write the standard output to.
        config - The config file to use for the TracingFormatter.
        If this is null a config file with a default name will be created in a directory called "config" in the directory the file that is currently being executed is stored in.
        If this is a directory a config file with a default name will be created in this directory.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - if the log file exists but is a directory rather than a regular file, does not exist but cannot be created, or cannot be opened for any other reason.

        public static void traceOutput(File config,
                               OutputStream... additionalStreams)

        Also sets the TracingFormatter config file.

        If this is null a config file with a default name will be created in a directory called "config" in the directory the file that is currently being executed is stored in.
        If this is a directory a config file with a default name will be created in this directory.
        additionalStreams - the OutputStreams to add to System.out.

        public static String classNameToSimpleClassName(String className)
        Converts the class name with package to a simple class name without.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the simple class name for the given class name.

      • getLogger

        public static Logger getLogger(String name)
        Gets a Logger that logs messages with log level info or below to System.out, and warning or above to System.err, with the given custom name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the Logger to get.
        Returns:
        the Logger for the given name.

      • getGlobal

        public static Logger getGlobal()
        Gets the global Logger and makes it log messages with log level info or below to System.out, and warning or above to System.err.
        Returns:
        the global logger.

      • getError

        public static Logger getError()
        Gets the system error Logger.
        Returns:
        the system error Logger.

      • getOutput

        public static Logger getOutput()
        Gets the system output Logger.
        Returns:
        the system output Logger.

      • setConfig

        public static void setConfig(File config)
        Sets the config file for the system error and output PrintStream TracingFormatters.
        If this is null a config file with a default name will be created in a directory called "config" in the directory the file that is currently being executed is stored in.
        If that file is a directory a config file with a default name will be created in this directory.
        Parameters:
        config - the new system error and output config file.

      • setErrorConfig

        public static void setErrorConfig(File errorConfig)
        Sets the config file for the system error PrintStream TracingFormatters.
        If this is null a config file with a default name will be created in a directory called "config" in the directory the file that is currently being executed is stored in.
        If that file is a directory a config file with a default name will be created in this directory.
        Parameters:
        errorConfig - the new system error config file.

      • setOutputConfig

        public static void setOutputConfig(File outputConfig)
        Sets the config file for the system output PrintStream TracingFormatters.
        If this is null a config file with a default name will be created in a directory called "config" in the directory the file that is currently being executed is stored in.
        If that file is a directory a config file with a default name will be created in this directory.
        Parameters:
        outputConfig - the new system output config file.

      • getCallerStackTraceElement

        public static StackTraceElement getCallerStackTraceElement(String callerName)
        Gets the first StackTraceElement in the Thread calling this method from the given class.
        Parameters:
        callerName - the name of the class to look for.
        Returns:
        the StackTraceElement of the searched class, or null, if there was no StackTraceElement from that class.

      • resetErr

        public static void resetErr()
        Resets the system error output to its value from before this class changed it. And maybe before other classes changed it.

      • resetOut

        public static void resetOut()
        Resets the system output to its value from before this class changed it. And maybe before other classes changed it.
